name: Jump-Man falls hard (Trijam #148)
description:
This is our Game Jam entry for Trijam 148: Inconvenient super powers.

Did you know that pre-1940s Superman jumped rather than flew? Now imagine that without super strength and near invincibility...

...exactly!

How much of your super power will you dare to use? How much risk are you willing to take? Get to the mission target in as few jumps as possible but be careful. You are not of much health lying around in the hospital.

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
